turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I would like to I would like to order a coffee from the Starbucks on Ward Parkway in Kansas City.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: how can i help?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what would you like to order from there?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm not really sure. Do they have any caramel flavor coffee drinks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, you may check starbuck's menu online for a complete list. but their menu includes Iced Caramel Brulée Latte, Iced Caramel Macchiato

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and Iced Starbucks® Blonde Caramel Brulée Latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure. and what size did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What are their medium sizes?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so you would like to order a grande Iced Starbucks® Blonde Caramel Brulée Latte?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, that sounds good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, the total for your order will be $5.00.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, but I need that the milk to be non-dairy. What kind of non-dairy milk do they have?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the non dairy options at starbucks are almond and soy.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: which did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll take the soy milk with that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. a grande Iced Starbucks® Blonde Caramel Brulée Latte with soy milk is $5.50.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, yes. I do.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I've ordered your drink for you at Starbucks in kansas city. it should be ready for pick up in 9 minutes. Your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message shortly.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great.
